name: Best Bacon Wrapped Water Chestnuts
author: Kevin Bennett
summary: This is the way my mother made them when I was growing up. And they were always a treat. The sauce is from another recipe on here but I found that it perfectly balances out the saltiness of the bacon and soy sauce.
directions: Soak water chestnuts in a bowl with soy sauce for at least 3 hours; drain
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Wrap each water chestnut with a piece of bacon; secure with a toothpick and arrange on a shallow baking dish
Bake in the preheated oven until bacon is crisp, 25 to 35 minutes
Meanwhile, mix brown sugar, mayonnaise, and chili sauce in a bowl until dipping sauce is smooth
Serve bacon-wrapped water chestnuts with dipping sauce
